TravelTriangle > Blog > Abu Dhabi > 10 Resorts In Abu Dhabi To Soak In The Extravagance Of The Arab In 2025 10 Resorts In Abu Dhabi To Soak In The Extravagance Of The Arab In 2025 .. SHARES Updated Date: 29 January 2025 The United Arab Emirates is the ultimate destination to experience the best of luxury and extravagance in the most satisfying way! Dubai and Abu Dhabi together account for unique handpicked experiences that are crafted to mesmerize every visitor and make them feel special. And what could be a place more befitting that one of the outrageously luxurious resorts in Abu Dhabi where world-class experiences are just one of their kind, majestic and enchanting, equipped with every possible activity to make travelers feel so special about themselves!Therefore, without thinking much just book a stay in one of the top Abu Dhabi resorts in UAE where the tariff is just a number and experiences account for the name.  Table Of Content Most popular 5-star Abu Dhabi Resorts Of 2025 All of these 5-star resorts are unique in their own way and can be considered for a momentous vacation in the Arab Emirates. Take a look! Zaya Nurai Island Resort – For Ultimate Crafted Experiences Qasr Al Sarab – For Memorable Sunrises In The Dunes Park Hyatt Abu Dhabi – Overlooking The Grand Arabian Gulf Anantara Desert Island Resort – A Top Stay On Yas Island Shangri-La Hotel – Elegance Personified The St. Regis Abu Dhabi – Unmatchable Views Around Four Seasons – The Best Resort For All Seasons Beach Rotana, Abu Dhabi – For Magical Skyline Views Sheraton Abu Dhabi Hotel & Resort – Grandeur On Budget Khalidiya Palace Rayhaan by Rotana – Views Worth Dying! 1. Zaya Nurai Island Resort – For Ultimate Crafted Experiences Located adjacent to the Arabian gulf, and a 12 minute boat ride from Saadiyat Island in Abu Dhabi, the Zaya Nurai Island Resort is one of the best resorts in Abu Dhabi with private pool. It offers perfect lavish stay for your comfort. A private temperature-controlled pool and view overlooking the Arabian Sea, their specially designed villas are what makes it one of the best Abu Dhabi luxury resorts . What’s more is that you can enjoy listening to the calming waves splashing across the seashore during your spa sessions here! Tariff: INR 60000 per night onwardsWhat’s special: Private romantic dinner, private BBQ, private floating Shushi platter, a beach house, and water villa Also Read: Hotels In Abu Dhabi Dubai Holiday Packages On TravelTriangle Travel Dubai in Luxury. Visit grand Burj Khalifa or the breathtaking Palm Islands. Enjoy Dhow Cruise, International Buffet Dinner, Dubai City Tour, Desert Safari, Ferrari World and Abu Dhabi City Tour. Book Now See more at TRAVELTRIANGLE.COM Visit Website 2. Qasr Al Sarab – For Memorable Sunrises In The Dunes With a 2 hours drive from Abu Dhabi, you will enter this mini-paradise resort, situated in the Liwa desert with a castle-like decor that is a must watch. While you can relax in the Anantara spa, after enjoying the camel treks and dune bashing organized by their Excursion Centre, there are also options of fine dining in-house restaurants serving Arabic and French cuisines. This resort is considered to be one of the best Abu Dhabi beach resorts. Tariff: INR 29000 per night onwardsWhat’s special: Indoor & outdoor pool, sunrise over sand, royal pavilion courtyard, ancient hammam rituals, and dune bashing 3. Park Hyatt Abu Dhabi – Overlooking The Grand Arabian Gulf Indulge in the refreshing beauty of a private beach on Saadiyat island with the stylish comfort of Park Hyatt in Abu Dhabi. A mere 35 minutes drive from the Abu Dhabi International Airport will take you to this magnificent hotel with villas painted in soft colours. This hotel can serve as the ideal weekend getaway if you wish to spend a laidback holiday and you can choose from their very best 3 in-house restaurants serving a wide range of international cuisines. Tariff: INR 15400 per night onwardsWhat’s special: Pool, fitness center, private beach, ocean view, kids club, and rooftop bar Related Post: Indian Restaurants In Abu Dhabi 4. Anantara Desert Island Resort – A Top Stay On Yas Island Experience the best of Sir Bani Yas Island with Anantara Desert Island Resort as you can witness the scenic Arabian Gulf in all its shades from the infinity pool here. The Al Shams restaurant serves some of the best international cuisines with a candlelit setting for a dinner date with your loved one. It is one of the best resorts in Abu Dhabi desert that lets you explore the nearby activities for snorkelling, kayaking, guided nature walks and more for a fee. Tariff: INR 15000 per night onwardsWhat’s special: Flamingos at the beach nearby, mangrove lagoon, white sand beach, infinity pool, wildlife drive, horse riding, and outdoor activities 5. Shangri-La Hotel – Elegance Personified Exclusively designed with modern Arabic style, the suites at Shangri-La are waiting for you to step in for a mesmerising holiday. Offering Arabic gondola rides and a spa with outdoor pool and massages, you’ll also get to taste authentic Chinese cuisines at the Shang Palace restaurant and savour some French delicacies at Bord Eau restaurant. Tariff: INR 13780 per night onwardsWhat’s special: Grand Mosque and Souk nearby, infinity pool, chocolate fountain, jet ski, and spa Related Post: Abu Dhabi Beaches 6. The St. Regis Abu Dhabi – Unmatchable Views Around Feel like a royal by staying in one of the signature suites of The St. Regis in Abu Dhabi with wonderful views of the Corniche. The various restaurants at the hotel to satiate your Italian, burgers, and grilled food cravings makes it one of the best family resorts in abu dhabi. The nearby attractions include the very famous Sheikh Zayed Grand Mosque, Abu Dhabi Mall and Marina Mall. You can also go to the Nation Riviera Beach Club which is accessible via a private underpass right below the Corniche. Tariff: INR 11300 per night onwardsWhat’s special: St Regis bar, lounge, and Villa Toscana, the Terrace, beach club, private beach, and spa 7. Four Seasons – The Best Resort For All Seasons Witness the spectacular city skyline at soothing waves of the Arabian Gulf at Al Maryah Island by staying in Four Seasons where luxury meets comfort in style. If you’re planning to stay here for 6 days, you can choose a different restaurant each day offering a wide range of several cuisines to savour. Get prepared to woo your senses in Dahlia Spa with spacious spa treatment suites to rejuvenate for a better vacay. Tariff: INR 11300 per night onwardsWhat’s special: Cafe Milano, deluxe stays, top service, and terrific sea views Related Post: Abu Dhabi Nightlife 8. Beach Rotana, Abu Dhabi – For Magical Skyline Views Rooms featuring elegant decor, and balconies with sea views, the Beach Rotana Resort is one of the best resorts in Abu Dhabi islands. that defines comfort like no other. You can enjoy a cocktail at their pool bar and also choose from 11 restaurants abode. If this is not enough for your holiday, then a sundeck with loungers under the palm trees at this property will definitely top it up. Perfect for a couple’s stay, this resort has more to offer with their spa treatments and steam baths. Tariff: INR 7800 per night onwardsWhat’s special: Private gaming arena, sauna, jacuzzi, Turkish steam bath, chemotherapy bath, and a lot more 9. Sheraton Abu Dhabi Hotel & Resort – Grandeur On Budget Redefine your ideal holiday in the lap of luxury with a stay at Sheraton Hotel, one of the best family beach resorts in Abu Dhabi. It offers lavish suites with marble bathrooms and balconies overlooking the city and Gulf to its visitors. You can dig in for a flavourful meal at the 12 in-house restaurants serving Mexican, Spanish, Italian and seafood. While this may not be enough, you also have the option of dining outdoors, overlooking the ocean at this property. Tariff: INR 6000 per night onwardsWhat’s special: Pet-friendly, health club, private beach, restaurant & bar, and pool bar Related Post: Shopping In Abu Dhabi 10. Khalidiya Palace Rayhaan By Rotana – Views Worth Dying! Close to the splendid Presidential Palace, the Khalidiya Palace Rayhaan offers 443 spectacular rooms with a fine blend of modern culture in traditional Arabian environment. Offering various signature face and body spa treatments, you can have an paramount rejuvenating experience at their Wellness and Massage in-house centre. One can choose from various restaurants at the property serving Arabic and international cuisines. Tariff: INR 6000 per night onwardsWhat’s special: Emirates Palace, outdoor pool, and Marina Beach in the vicinity. You May Also Like To Read: Things To Do In Abu Dhabi Every traveller wants the lavish stay with warm hospitality on their visit to Dubai. With the above list, you will get to know about the top places to stay. For once, if you want to experience grandeur at its best then head to one of the resorts in Abu Dhabi! Even better, book an trip to Abu Dhabi and get enchanted by the sheer charm of UAE. For our editorial codes of conduct and copyright disclaimer, please click here. Cover Image Credit:Wadiia for Wikimedia Commons Frequently Asked Questions About Resorts In Abu Dhabi  What are some of the best resorts in Abu Dhabi? Four Seasons and the St. Regis are some of the best resorts in Abu Dhabi desert. Which are resorts in Saadiyat Island Abu Dhabi? Zaya Nurai Island Resort and Park Hyatt are some of the top resorts located on the Saadiyat Island. Which are the best resorts in Abu Dhabi with a private pool? Zaya Nurai Island Resort is one of the best resorts in Abu Dhabi with a private pool. Which is the most luxurious area in Abu Dhabi? Some of the most important and luxurious areas in Abu Dhabi are the Corniche Road, Al Maryah Island, Al Bateen, Mohammed Bin Zayed City, etc. How many days in Abu Dhabi is enough? 3-4 days are ideally good to spend your time and experience the top attractions in Abu Dhabi. Also, you can indulge in multiple activities these days to add charm to your trip. What is the best part of Abu Dhabi to stay? Some of the best areas to stay in the top Abu Dhabi resorts or hotels are Saadiyat Island, Al Reem Island, Al Raha, the Corniche, Al Reef, etc. At these areas, you will find the budget-friendly and luxurious both stay options.
